#####
Usage
#####

Currently there are 2 approaches for using this package: the :ref:`functions-approach-label` and the :ref:`class-approach-label`.

*****************
When to use each?
*****************

* :ref:`functions-approach-label`: When you are going to do a single operation with the same dates.
* :ref:`class-approach-label`: When you are going to do multiple operations with the same dates.



.. note::
   ðŸ’¡ Please consider that the default date format is :code:`'%Y-%m-%d'`, eg: :code:`'2021-12-25'`. Anyways, you can indicate the format of your date if you need to.
